channel.title: 667 item def editor. Please helpppp!
channel.description:
Hello, I used the item editor on NRS3 server and i got 2 files when i finished my work (adding roll option for dice) I saved the definitions and cache. Then i got 2 files obj.idx and obj.dat. Does anyone know where i have to put them and whit what names?
I used the editor by opening it then load the cache ( i think it already had all of the cache) and then searching for id 15098 then adding a roll option saving the definitions and saved the cache.
edit: And how do i make that when i die i loose all of my items? (3 left)

item.title: 667 item def editor. Please helpppp!
item.dc:creator: @coollah coollah
item.description:
@coollah wrote:

Hello, I used the item editor on NRS3 server and i got 2 files when i finished my work (adding roll option for dice) I saved the definitions and cache. Then i got 2 files obj.idx and obj.dat. Does anyone know where i have to put them and whit what names?
